definitions.definition: An act performed for amusement ; a joke .
examples: I made that comment in jest ; it wasn't serious.

definitions.definition: Someone or something that is ridiculed ; the target of a joke .
examples: Your majesty, stop him before he makes you the jest of the court.

definitions.definition: A deed; an action; a gest .
A mask ; a pageant ; an interlude .

main_definition: ( archaic ) An act performed for amusement ; a joke .
secondary_definitions: ( archaic ) Someone or something that is ridiculed ; the target of a joke .
( obsolete ) A deed; an action; a gest .
( obsolete ) A mask ; a pageant ; an interlude .
